title: Calling the restaurant to make a reservation

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Hello and welcome to our restaurant, my name is {AI_NAME}, how can I assist you today?
turns.user_response_option_en: Hi, I would like to make a reservation for two at 7 pm on Saturday.
turns.ai_conversation_starter_ko: 안녕하세요, 저희 레스토랑에 오신 것을 환영합니다. 제 이름은 {AI_NAME}입니다. 오늘 무엇을 도와드릴까요?
turns.user_response_option_ko: 안녕하세요, 토요일 오후 7시에 2인 예약을 하고 싶습니다.

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Hello and welcome to our restaurant, my name is {AI_NAME}, how can I assist you today?
turns.user_response_option_en: Hello, I'm looking to reserve a table for a group of six people for Thursday at 6 pm. Is that possible?

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Hello and welcome to our restaurant, my name is {AI_NAME}, how can I assist you today?
turns.user_response_option_en: Good afternoon, I'd like to book a table for a special occasion on Friday at 8 pm. Can you accommodate a party of four?

turns.user_response_option_ko: 안녕하세요, 금요일 오후 8시에 특별한 날을 위해 테이블을 예약하고 싶습니다. 4인 파티를 수용할 수 있나요?

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Certainly, we have availability for two at 7 pm on Saturday. May I have your name and phone number, please?
turns.user_response_option_en: Sure, my name is {USER_NAME} and my phone number is 555-1234.

turns.user_response_option_ko: 네, 제 이름은 {USER_NAME}이고 전화번호는 555-1234입니다.

turns.user_response_option_en: May I know a bit more about the restaurant? Do you have any dress code or specials for the occasion?
